title: $:/plugins/xp/aggregation-enterprises
name: Enterprises
author: kl
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/xp/ui/Actions/new-enterprise":{"title":"$:/xp/ui/Actions/new-enterprise","description":"create a new enterprise","tags":"$:/tags/Actions","text":"\define get-tags() $(textFieldTags)$ \define get-text() $(textField)$ <$vars textFieldTags={{$:/config/new-enterprise/Tags}} textField={{$:/config/new-enterprise/Text}}> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-new-tiddler" title=<> tags=<> text=<> caption="an enterprise" country="" fdate="" image="$:/enterprise.png" link="" /> "},"$:/xp/ui/Actions/new-enterprisecategory":{"title":"$:/xp/ui/Actions/new-enterprisecategory","description":"create a new category","tags":"$:/tags/Actions","text":"\define get-tags() $(textFieldTags)$ $(tagsFieldTags)$ \define prefixText() <$text text={{{ [[< \define suffixText() <$text text={{{ [[">>]] }}}/> <$vars newcategoryTitle={{$:/config/new-enterprisecategory/Title}} newcategoryCaption={{$:/config/new-enterprisecategory/Caption}} textFieldTags={{$:/config/new-enterprisecategory/Tags}} tagsFieldTags={{$:/config/new-enterprisecategory/Tags!!tags}} newcategoryCtag={{$:/config/new-enterprisecategory/Ctag}} ctagStoreTiddler="$:/config/new-enterprisecategory/Ctag" storeTiddler="$:/config/new-enterprisecategory/Title/input" listopsTiddler="$:/enterprises-newcategory" > <$reveal type="nomatch" state=<> text=""> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text=<>/> <$wikify name="newcategoryText" text={{{ [addprefixaddsuffix] }}}> <$reveal type="match" state=<> text=""> <$reveal type="nomatch" state=<> text=""> <$action-createtiddler $basetitle=<> caption=<> tags=<> ctag=<> text=<> list-before=<>/> <$reveal type="match" state=<> text=""> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-notify" $param="$:/language/Notifications/ctagEmpty"/> "},"$:/xp/ui/Buttons/new-enterprisecategory":{"title":"$:/xp/ui/Buttons/new-enterprisecategory","caption":"{{$:/core/images/new-button}} new category","description":"Create a new category","text":"<$button actions={{$:/xp/ui/Actions/new-enterprisecategory}} tooltip="Create a new category" aria-label="new category"> Create "},"ENTERPRISES":{"title":"ENTERPRISES","caption":"{{$:/xp/images/enterprises}} ENTERPRISES","color":"#bbb","icon":"$:/xp/images/enterprises","tmap.id":"ca70a35b-1755-4e0f-ae60-25777277dc0f","text":"\import $:/enterprises-macros
<$button actions={{$:/xp/ui/Actions/new-enterprise}} tooltip="Create a new enterprise" aria-label="new enterprise" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini"> {{$:/core/images/new-button}} new enterprise  <> <>
<$macrocall $name="tabs" tabsList="$:/enterprises-aggregation-view $:/enterprises-category-view $:/enterprises-recently-added" default="$:/enterprises-aggregation-view" state="$:/state/tab/enterprise" />"},"$:/enterprises-category-500":{"title":"$:/enterprises-category-500","caption":"500","ctag":"500","tags":"$:/tags/EnterpriseCategories","text":"//世界 500 强。// <>"},"$:/enterprises-category-death":{"title":"$:/enterprises-category-death","caption":"Death","ctag":"Death","tags":"$:/tags/EnterpriseCategories","text":"<>"},"$:/enterprises-category-survival":{"title":"$:/enterprises-category-survival","caption":"Survival","ctag":"Survival","tags":"$:/tags/EnterpriseCategories","text":"<>"},"$:/enterprises-category-个人独资企业":{"title":"$:/enterprises-category-个人独资企业","caption":"个人独资企业","ctag":"个人独资企业","tags":"$:/tags/EnterpriseCategories","text":"//（由一个自然人投资设立）它下设分支机构性质为“个人独资企业分支机构”。// <>"},"$:/enterprises-category-全民所有制企业":{"title":"$:/enterprises-category-全民所有制企业","caption":"全民所有制企业","ctag":"全民所有制企业","tags":"$:/tags/EnterpriseCategories","text":"//全民所有制企业，“国有”和“全民”统称为全民所有制。它分为企业法人和营业单位两种。营业单位也可以由企业法人下设成立。// <>"},"$:/enterprises-category-农民专业合作社":{"title":"$:/enterprises-category-农民专业合作社","caption":"农民专业合作社","ctag":"农民专业合作社","tags":"$:/tags/EnterpriseCategories","text":"<>"},"$:/enterprises-category-合伙企业":{"title":"$:/enterprises-category-合伙企业","caption":"合伙企业","ctag":"合伙企业","tags":"$:/tags/EnterpriseCategories","text":"//（合伙人可以是两个以上自然人，也可以是有限公司、企业法人、事业法人、社团法人等）它分为普通合伙和有限合伙。如下设分支机构，性质为“合伙企业分支机构”。// <>"},"$:/enterprises-category-有限责任公司":{"title":"$:/enterprises-category-有限责任公司","caption":"有限责任公司","ctag":"有限责任公司","tags":"$:/tags/EnterpriseCategories","text":"//包括：1、有限责任公司，它可再细分为：自然人独资、法人独资、自然人投资或控股、国有独资、外商投资、外商独资。它还可以下设分公司，其性质为“有限责任公司分公司”。2、股份有限公司，它可再细分为：上市和非上市两种。它也可下设分公司，性质为“股份有限公司分公司”。// <>"},"$:/enterprises-category-集体所有制企业":{"title":"$:/enterprises-category-集体所有制企业","caption":"集体所有制企业","ctag":"集体所有制企业","tags":"$:/tags/EnterpriseCategories","text":"//它也分为企业法人和营业单位两种。集体所有制企业法人主办单位一般是事业单位、社团组织、工会、村委会等。营业单位可以由企业法人下设成立，也可由事业单位、社团组织、工会、村委会等法人组织直接下设成立。// <>"},"$:/enterprises-managetabs":{"title":"$:/enterprises-managetabs","caption":"{{$:/core/images/options-button}}","tags":"$:/tags/EnterpriseCategories","text":"\import $:/enterprises-macros \define selectDefaultTab() <$select tiddler='$:/config/xp/aggregation-enterprises/category-view/DefaultTab'> <$list filter='[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag!has[draft.of]remove[$:/enterprises-newcategory $:/enterprises-managetabs]] :filter[lookup!match[hide]]'> \end ! 默认分类 设置维基启动后默认显示的标签页：<> ! 管理分类 Select which tabs will be shown. Drag and drop to change the ordering
''Caption'' -- //Ctag// <$macrocall $name="list-tagged-draggable" tag=<> subFilter="!has[draft.of]remove[$:/listing-enterprises-all $:/enterprises-newcategory $:/enterprises-managetabs]" itemTemplate="$:/templates/aggregation-categories-item" />
"},"$:/enterprises-newcategory":{"title":"$:/enterprises-newcategory","caption":"{{$:/core/images/new-button}}","tags":"$:/tags/EnterpriseCategories","text":"\define titleStoreTiddler() $:/config/new-enterprisecategory/Title \define captionStoreTiddler() $:/config/new-enterprisecategory/Caption \define ctagStoreTiddler() $:/config/new-enterprisecategory/Ctag \define storeTiddler() $:/config/new-enterprisecategory/Title/input \define newButton() {{$:/xp/ui/Buttons/new-enterprisecategory}} \define deleteButton() \whitespace trim <$vars newcategoryTitle={{$:/config/new-enterprisecategory/Title}}> <$list filter="[get[text]match]" variable="ignore"> <$button tooltip="Delete existing tiddler" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini tc-small-gap-right"> {{$:/core/images/delete-button}} <$action-confirm $message="Are you sure you wish to delete this tiddler?"> <$action-deletetiddler $filter="[] []" /> \end \define promptText() <$vars newcategoryTitle={{$:/config/new-enterprisecategory/Title}}> <$list filter="[get[text]match]" variable="ignore"> {{$:/aggregation/ErrorText}} \end ! 新建分类 |<$link to=<>>Title |<$edit-text tiddler=<> default="" tag="input"/> <> | |<$link to=<>>Caption |<$edit-text tiddler=<> default="" tag="input"/> | |<$link to=<>>Ctag |<$edit-text tiddler=<> default="" tag="input"/> | |>| <> | <> {{$:/language/xp/aggregation/NewCategoryTips}}"},"$:/enterprises-starred-items":{"title":"$:/enterprises-starred-items","caption":"Starred","ctag":"Star","tags":"$:/tags/EnterpriseCategories","text":"\import $:/enterprises-macros {{$:/aggregation-starred-items}}"},"$:/listing-enterprises-all":{"title":"$:/listing-enterprises-all","caption":"全部","tags":"$:/tags/EnterpriseCategories","text":"\import $:/enterprises-macros <$macrocall $name="aggregation-list-thumbnails" width="220" height="123" storeTitle="$:/temp/search/enterprises/thumbnails" searchClass="xp-search-enterprises" promptTiddler="$:/enterprises-prompt" /> "},"$:/tags/EnterpriseCategories":{"title":"$:/tags/EnterpriseCategories","list":"$:/listing-enterprises-all $:/enterprises-starred-items $:/enterprises-category-有限责任公司 $:/enterprises-category-个人独资企业 $:/enterprises-category-合伙企业 $:/enterprises-category-全民所有制企业 $:/enterprises-category-集体所有制企业 $:/enterprises-category-农民专业合作社 $:/enterprises-category-500 $:/enterprises-category-survival $:/enterprises-category-death $:/enterprises-newcategory $:/enterprises-managetabs"},"$:/config/xp/aggregation-enterprises/DefaultView":{"title":"$:/config/xp/aggregation-enterprises/DefaultView","text":"table"},"$:/config/xp/aggregation-enterprises/ReadingMode":{"title":"$:/config/xp/aggregation-enterprises/ReadingMode","text":"off"},"$:/config/xp/aggregation-enterprises/TableFields":{"title":"$:/config/xp/aggregation-enterprises/TableFields","text":"tbl-expand title country fdate"},"$:/config/xp/aggregation-enterprises/category/preset":{"title":"$:/config/xp/aggregation-enterprises/category/preset","text":"Star 有限责任公司 个人独资企业 合伙企业 全民所有制企业 集体所有制企业 农民专业合作社 500 Survival Death"},"$:/config/xp/aggregation-enterprises/category-view/DefaultTab":{"title":"$:/config/xp/aggregation-enterprises/category-view/DefaultTab","text":"$:/listing-enterprises-all"},"$:/config/new-enterprise/Tags":{"title":"$:/config/new-enterprise/Tags","text":"Enterprise"},"$:/config/new-enterprise/Text":{"title":"$:/config/new-enterprise/Text"},"$:/config/new-enterprisecategory/Caption":{"title":"$:/config/new-enterprisecategory/Caption"},"$:/config/new-enterprisecategory/Ctag":{"title":"$:/config/new-enterprisecategory/Ctag"},"$:/config/new-enterprisecategory/Tags":{"title":"$:/config/new-enterprisecategory/Tags","text":"$:/tags/EnterpriseCategories"},"$:/config/new-enterprisecategory/Title":{"title":"$:/config/new-enterprisecategory/Title","text":"$:/enterprises-category-"},"$:/config/xp/aggregation/ui/enterprises":{"title":"$:/config/xp/aggregation/ui/enterprises","text":"ENTERPRISES"},"$:/enterprises-aggregation-view":{"title":"$:/enterprises-aggregation-view","caption":"聚合视图","text":"\import $:/enterprises-macros <$macrocall $name="aggregation-with-tag" state="aggregation-enterprises" class="" cardTemplate="$:/enterprises-card-template" searchClass="xp-search-enterprises" promptTiddler="$:/enterprises-prompt" />"},"$:/enterprises-card-template":{"title":"$:/enterprises-card-template","text":"<$macrocall $name="thumbnail" link={{!!link}} icon={{!!icon}} color={{!!color}} background-color={{!!background-color}} image={{!!image}} caption={{!!caption}} width="220" height="123"/>"},"$:/enterprises-category-view":{"title":"$:/enterprises-category-view","caption":"分类视图","text":"\import $:/enterprises-macros <$wikify name="tabsList" text="""<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag!has[draft.of]] :filter[lookup!match[hide]]" variable="listItem"> <$text text={{{ [format:titlelist[]] }}}/> """> <$macrocall $name="tabs" tabsList=<> default={{$:/config/xp/aggregation-enterprises/category-view/DefaultTab}} class="" /> "},"$:/enterprises-help":{"title":"$:/enterprises-help","color":"#bbb","icon":"$:/core/images/help","text":"
ENTERPRISES 是企业的索引界面。使用方法与 BOOKSHELF 基本一致，请参阅 [[Bookshelf Help|$:/bookshelf-help]]。
! 如何使用？ 点击 {{$:/core/images/new-button}} new enterprise 创建一个企业。 常用字段：
|!Field |!Description | |`caption` |显示名称，通常是对 `title` 的简化或者别称。 | |`image` |封面图（宽高比 220:123 px），不支持 SVG。建议标题使用小写和下划线。为了管理，添加标签 <>。 | |`link` |填入一个 `title`，使得点击封面图时打开该条目。 | |`country` |公司属于哪个国家。 | |`fdate` |（Founding Date）公司成立日期。（一般指企业被批准成立，发给营业执照的日期。） |
该主题预设分类标签以 [[Title List|https://tiddlywiki.com/static/Title%2520List.html]] 的形式存储于： <> 其他说明： * 企业分类参考「[[目前的企业类型有哪些|https://www.66law.cn/laws/611214.aspx]]」。"},"$:/enterprises-macros":{"title":"$:/enterprises-macros","tags":"$:/tags/Macro/Aggregation","text":"\define aggregationTag() Enterprise \define systemCTag() $:/tags/EnterpriseCategories \define uiTitle() $:/config/xp/aggregation/ui/enterprises \define categoryPrefix() $:/config/xp/aggregation-enterprises/category/ \define config-base() $:/config/xp/aggregation-enterprises/Tabs/Visibility/ 
<$view field="text"/>
"},"$:/enterprises-prompt":{"title":"$:/enterprises-prompt","text":"
{{$:/xp/images/enterprise}}
New enterprise will appear here
"},"$:/enterprises-recently-added":{"title":"$:/enterprises-recently-added","caption":"最近添加","text":"\import $:/enterprises-macros \define configTiddler() $:/temp/enterprises/limitparam {{$:/aggregation-recently-added}}"},"$:/enterprise.png":{"title":"$:/enterprise.png","text":"","type":"image/png","tags":"$:/tags/Image"},"$:/xp/images/enterprise":{"title":"$:/xp/images/enterprise","tags":"$:/tags/Image","text":"\parameters (size:"22pt") "},"$:/xp/images/enterprises":{"title":"$:/xp/images/enterprises","tags":"$:/tags/Image","text":"\parameters (size:"22pt") "}}}
